name: THE FAMILY WELFARE AGENCY

address: The Family Welfare Agency, Near B.D.D. chawl no 10, N.M.Joshi Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai: 400 013.

briefDescription: Journey through the yearsSocial organization established in 1950 Registered under the Bombay Public Trust Act of 1950 [E-5(BOM)].Specialized services in the field of (i) aging and (ii) mental health Multi service centre for the senior citizens - Lower Parel and Dharavi.Multi disciplinary services are provided – educational, health care management,  medical and nutritional, yoga, physiotherapy, recreational, government facilities – senior citizens ID, Old age pension, therapeutic – music, clay, brain gym, individual and family counseling, group work, celebration – World Elders day, Elder abuse awareness day, community outreach and care of the homebound.Day care for the recovering mentally ill patients The centre conducts individual and family counseling, group work, educational, recreational and therapeutic activities - yoga, animal assisted therapy, physical exercise, occupational skills – kitchen activity, parents support group, world mental health day celebration, annual sports day, vocational training and sale of products or job opportunities and community mental health.
